name: UIFocusDebugger
desc: A runtime object for debugging focus-related interactions.

items.name: class func help() -> UIFocusDebuggerOutput
items.desc: Returns information about how to use the commands of the debugger object.

items.name: class func status() -> UIFocusDebuggerOutput
items.desc: Returns the state of the focus system, including information about the currently focused item.

items.name: class func checkFocusability(for: UIFocusItem) -> UIFocusDebuggerOutput
items.desc: Returns information about whether the item can be focused, including any known issues that would prevent the item from being focused.

items.name: class func simulateFocusUpdateRequest(from: UIFocusEnvironment) -> UIFocusDebuggerOutput
items.desc: Simulates a focus update request from the specified environment.

items.name: protocol UIFocusDebuggerOutput
items.desc: An interface for specifying output from a focus debugger object.
